channel.title: salix-next on The Salix Blog
channel.description: Recent content in salix-next on The Salix Blog

item.title: Preparing for 15.0
item.description: It seems like, finally, the pieces are being put in place for the next Slackware release. It has been a long wait, it will be 5 years since the 14.2 release in a few months. Since Salix releases are tied to Slackware releases, there hasn’t been a Salix release for a long while too. Major changes that the next Slackware release will introduce include a switch to PAM, Linux kernel 5.
